title: Eurocast

descriptionHTML:
NOTE: This project is a bachelor thesis at JKU Linz. It is currently used to identify user data and track listening behavior. By downloading, you accept that your listener behaviour is stored externally.

Eurocast delivers your favourite radio stations to your mobile device. Enjoy the stream anywhere.

Join the social network on Google+ and Facebook to see what your friends are listening to.
Get new suggestions and reccomendations from your friends and all over the world.

With the integrated song detection you always know which song is currently playing.


Available Countries:
Austria
Germany
Italy
Spain
Russia
Switzerland
Greece
USA
France
Greece
Belgice
Croatia
Turkey
and much more.

Compatible Devices:
# Smartphones
# Tablets
# Chromecast
# AndroidWear - Control your playback simply on the watch
# AndroidAuto - Eurocast will even join you on the road
# AndroidTV - Enjoy home entertainment in your living room


Features coming soon:
# Radio-Alarm - Wake up with your favourite stream - or even a random one - suprise guaranteed.
# Recording function - Record and store your mixes and play them whenever you want - Offline!


Permissions:
Location:
We will provide appropreiate suggestions according your location
Storage:
The app needs access to your storage for saving your records
